name: XIAOMI Kaco Lemo Calculator LCD Display
description:
IML technology for the panel, sandblasting texture cladding technology and aluminized molding lines of the body Lightweight aluminum alloy structure to reduce the weight of the whole machine. Multiple protections : child lock protection, overload protection, 10-minute automatic standby, and novice speed limit protection. Bottom wheel design to move easily ,Walking platform distance from the ground is only 57mm when in normal use, Just for less than half a square meter and 12.9cm thickness after folding. Different speed selection for the new beginner or experienced athletes. Has been integrated into Xiaomi's smart home ecosystem and can be set up and adjusted through the Mijia App ( can be downloaded from the App Store ). Installation-free design, The walking machine powered by the plug to do exercise, the remote control is powered by a button battery ( included in the product ). Suitable for doing exercise at home, office, garden, etc.

Folding design, noise reduction and foot feeling speed control.
Put the Mijia walker at home or in the office, take a walk and walk anytime, anywhere.
- Automatic speed control patent technology. Foot feeling speed control, easy shifting.
The athlete can realize the start and stop functions without manual operation, and the speed value of the walking machine
can be freely adjusted along with the change of position.
- Hidden LED display.
The number of movement steps, movement distance, exercise time, movement speed, and calorie consumption after the start is clearly visible.
- Aluminum alloy skeleton structure. Durable and durable.
The lightweight aluminum alloy frame greatly reduces the weight of the body and saves effort when moving. More sturdy and durable.
- Foldable design patent, the area after folding is less than half a square meter, the storage thickness is as low as 12.9cm,
the size is small, the body is slim, and the desk can be placed under the sofa at home.
- Intimate moving wheel, easy to move and save effort.
- Two sport modes are available.
The manual mode (M) is suitable for beginners to start, accelerate, decelerate, stop and switch modes via the remote control.
The automatic mode (A) is suitable for advanced users, and realizes the functions of starting, accelerating, uniform, decelerating,
and stopping by changing the position.
- Comfortable walking platform.
- Rugged high-density fiberboard, EVA cushioning layer for comfortable feet, smooth layer with low coefficient of friction,
and wear-resistant anti-slip walking layer.
- Linked to the Mijia APP, the sports data can be optimized. Through the data management of Mijia APP, you can record your every exercise data.

Package Included:
1 x Xiaomi Mijia Walking Pad
1 x Charing Cable
1 x Remote control
1 x Hanging Rope
1 x Wrench
1 x Silicone Oil

Brand: Xiaomi Mijia
Rated voltage: 220V~50Hz
Rated power: 746W
Sport Pattern: Manual Mode, Automatic Mode
Minimum speed: 0.5km/h
Maximum speed: 6.0km/h
Effective walking area: 1200X415mm
Maximum bearing weight: 90kg
Net weight: 28kg

description:
【Enjoy a wireless dual band speed of 1167Mbps】 With 300Mbps over the 2.4GHz band and 867Mbps over the the crystal clear 5GHz band, the max wireless speed is up to 1167Mbps. The 2.4GHz band offers transmission over greater distances with better coverage and better penetration through walls. The 5GHz band adopts 802.11ac technology. Less interference and higher speeds for a smoother experience watching HD videos and playing multiplayer online games.
【Integrated signal amplifier】 2.4GHz and 5GHz wireless chipset integrates PA and LNA. The PA (power amplifier) effectively strengthens the signal transmission power while the LNA (low noise amplifier) can improve the sensitivity of the signal receiver. Allows the signal to be transmitted over greater distances with better penetration through walls and wider coverage.
【An intelligent error correction algorithm】 improves weak signals for more stable and efficient transmission. The 5GHz band supports the LDPC (low-density parity-check code) error correction algorithm to enhance anti-jamming capabilities during data transmission.. Significantly enhanced Wi-Fi signal coverage for improved efficiency in data transmission.
【64MB Large Memory】 Smart home appliance era. More devices need stable connection. Xiaomi router 4A adopts 64MB memory that ensures stable transmission【Control In your Hands】 When an unknown device uses the Wi-Fi signal without permission the Mi WiFi app can send out a notification to inform the user that a new device has connected. If a suspicious device tries to join the network depending on the security level the device will be automatically blocked from connecting or you will be prompted to block the device with one push of a button.

name: Single- Tub Fully Automatic 3
description: LG 6.5 kg Inverter Top Load Fully Automatic Washing Machine comes with Smart Inverter an energy saving technology eliminates wasted operation by efficiently controlling energy use. Smart inverter Washing Machines adjust the energy consumption at optimum level in accordance with the required power. 3-STEP WASH combined with Turbodrum & Precise smart inverter control upgrades the way of washing & provides better performance. Powerful Washing With Multi Water Flow. you can lock all the keys to prevent settings from being changed by a child. Set your own program with additional options and save to favorites for use at a later time. If an error occurs, you can use the LG App or make a phone call to the LG Service center. A diagnosis can then be made resulting in less time wasted, less inconvenience and unnecessary visits. LG’s Auto Pre Wash is the easiest option to clear stain-removal concern. With one touch, tough stains are ready to be gone.Say goodbye to stains and dirt with the LG Automatic Top Load washing machine. It comes with features such as the TurboDrum, and Punch+ 3. This ensures a thorough and powerful wash. Also, if you face any issue or problem while using this washing machine, you can connect it to the SmartThin Q app and diagnose the issue. It is also sturdy and durable.Corrosion Resistance:- This LG washing machine is equipped with LG’s BMC Motor Protection feature which surrounds the motor completely. This keeps insects, dust, and humidity away from the motor.TurboDrum:- The TurboDrum technology ensures a powerful wash. This feature rotates the drum and pulsator in opposite directions to generate a strong water stream and remove the toughest of stains and dirt from your clothes easily.Punch+ 3:- This feature creates water streams in a vertical direction. This ensures that your laundry is washed evenly.Smart Diagnosis:- You can also diagnose up to 86 errors via the SmartThin Q app. All you need to do is connect the washing machine to this app to know the problem.Auto Restart:- If there is a power cut while the washing machine is functioning, you do not have to input the settings again after the power returns. It will pick up from where it left off.Stainless Steel Drum:- The drum is made of stainless steel, which makes it durable and rust-free. It also stops the formation of bacteria and keeps it away from germs.Tub Clean:- This feature removes any unpleasant smell as it sterilizes both the inner and outer tub.Child Lock:- With this feature, you can disable the control panel and keep the settings safe from the reach of your little one.

name: KONKA PRESSURE COOKER
description:
Metal brushed bronze body, simple and generous control panel, high-end fashion
Thickened 1.5mm liner, double spray non-stick coating, cooking rice not coke non-stick pan
Detachable exhaust valve, easy to clean after use
Unique waterproof tank design, timely diversion to prevent the safety of water in the power supply
1.5Kpa micro pressure design, the pressed rice particles are full and the taste is delicate
The top cover is designed to prevent the water from returning and keep the rice sweet

name: LW-18T
description:
Specifications:1. Voltage: 220V2. Power: 1500W3. Capacity: 1.7LFeatures:1. 304 Stainless Steel Inner Layer, standard food-grade stainless steel, rust-free, anti-scaling, odorless, easy to clean
2. 1.7L Large Capacity,one boiling can meet a family drink for multiple members, no need to boil water frequently
3. With the hollow insulation layer between inner and outer layer, it provides more heat insulation to protect you from scalding
4. Superior STRIX Temperature Control, Precise temperature control guarantees a full boiling and longer lifespan
5. Triple Security Protection,prevent electric shock, no electric leakage, and auto shutdown while dry operation and boiling
6. Seamless Uni-body Design,easy to clean, say goodbye to the inside dirt
7. Visible LED Indicator Light,convenient to follow up the water heating process
